reviews.sentence: Expensive food items. Please update carry out delivery menus. There are no restaurants in the area especially if you do not have a car would be nice to look at updated info.
Overall good stay. The lobby was clean. Buffet Breakfast was on site for an additional charge. The room needed to be updated and could be cleaner.

The hotel had me waiting at the airport for almost one hour and never told me where to meet the shuttle bus when I called. When I asked to have maintenance replace the batteries in the TV remote remote was not operating properly the maintenance person almost did not change them until I insisted. After he replaced them the remote worked perfectly. I just thought that the entire staff was not very freindly and acomodating.

They messed up on our reservation and because they were sold out I had to share a bed with my traveling partner. It was very loud and the air conditioner did not work along with many lights in the room and when we called down to the left front desk to ask for these things to be addressed they were unable to get somebody to the room because maintenance was not available. We went to check out the next day they had our check noted for an additional day and thank goodness that we had the printout of our reservation because the front desk agent was incredibly rude and was arguing that we messed up on the reservation and was fighting the fact that we wanted to check out. Once she finally fixed the issue in their computer system she abruptly hamded us our check out paper and never once apologized for any of the inconveniences or issues that were caused to us during our stay. Never again will we stay at this hotel.

Pick a different hotel. Unfortunately I had to stay here several times because this is where my company decided to have the meetings. The rooms are in serious need of updating the furniture looks about 20 or 30 years old. They turn the air off until someone checks in so when you get to the rooms they ’re extremely hot they even turn the air off in the small fitness center. It was just bought out by a new owner which has n’t seemed to get the billing part correct. The staff at the front desk are very friendly but the event manager is always missing and never available. I think you should look elsewhere for a nicer hotel. I have one more set of meetings and I am dreading them. I ’m not sure who they use for catering but we are not happy with the level of food that they have provided either. Really nothing good to say about this hotel. I certainly will never be back after this next meeting.

Could be better after renovation is complete. I like the customer service. Very friendly but the place is under construction. Not quiet. Under construction. Which is fine but they should inform guest before they come for peace.

Clean with onsite bar restaurant. Yes the property is a little “ tired ” looking but a full renovation is coming under the new ownership. I must say the reason I stayed here was because it was so close to the Airport and I ca n’t drive well in the dark. Arrived about 9 pm to a very clean room. I really liked the setup of the room with the big desk and big clean bathroom. Headed to the bar where they had beer on tap cocktails and wine. All reasonably priced. Had a great night sleep nice shower and made the decision to stay here again on my way out. My second night stay was just as nice and even had dinner in the restaurant and it was good. Good service polite staff and soft comfy bathroom towels.
Staff rude. Did n’t get King bed. Did n’t offer to help us when coffee maker did n’t work. Place was being renovated so facilities in poor condition.

Property is in the process of updating so there were areas that needed attention. All of the furniture etc. that was being replaced was is huge piles outside which is what we looked at from our window. Our room was not upgraded but it was clean and comfortable.

Excellent location comfortable rooms. The room was very nice quiet and spacious. The bed was very comfortable. The location is quite convenient to the airport and downtown Sacramento. The hotel is being updated and the common spaces were torn apart torn wallpaper in the halls missing baseboards etc. Looked awful. I guess they did not want to lose by emptying one corridor at a time to do the work but it looked dreadful.

Five Stars for Four Points. This property is fully rehabed and decorated ati it looks the best of all hotels in the Sacramento airport area. It is way above its rating. The interior is more like a four star hotel. It feels actually like a boutique hotel. The lobby is inviting and eclecticaly decorated. Rooms are spacious and redecorated. This is a pretty dope hotel. Way above our expectations. Service is very good and all people there are nice and smiling and inviting. The breakfast is pretty good not artificial as with other properties at the airport. Coffee is excellent. They also have a shuttle to the airport which is very convenient. There is also plenty of parking. It is a pretty hip property closer to Aloft than Four Points. The only disapointment is that as a Titanium member they promised me an upgrade but they never delivered.

Very quick and easy check in. Staff were attentive. The bar offered a very limited number of mixed drinks however there were a few wine selectionsBathrom was spacious and clean bed comfortable and the TV was an exceptional HD. The hotel had a newly remodeled air about it. A good place to stay if you need to be very near the airport which is about 10 minutes away.
Our rooms were very clean and updated. Beds very comfortable.

Disappointing. bill in maintenance was super nice and helpfulno room service was provided on 2nd day. no clean washcloths. cleaning service was beyond poor. did not clean bathroom or vacuum. very disappointed in cleaning service totaly unacceptable.
Beautiful property with new renovation.

Excellent Hotel near the airport. This hotel is newly renovated and has really excellent customer service staff members. Nothing was too much trouble. Love the new decorations in the lounge area. The free shuttle from to airport is a bonus as well.

Spent the night mid week in Dec The grounds are clean staff is very friendly and helpful. The lobby was laid out with seating up front transitioning to the bar dinning area. We were greeted and our reservations were processed quickly. Our room was clean and in good repair. Plenty of room with wardrobe dresser desk and chair. A bonus was the refrigerator and microwave. Two areas for improvement based on my stay was the interior lighting was not bright enough and the walls need additional insulation for sound proofing. You can actually hear the neighbors conversations. The moring breakfast buffet a lower end continental breakfast found at most hotels was lacking based on the 10 per person fee. We have had many free continental breakfasts that offer a greater selection. All in all I would stay here again but drive down the road to Black Bears for breakfast.

If you need an ADA room do n’t stay here. I made this reservation through the Mariot Bonvoy website. I went through the types of rooms and selected two doubles but it said this room not available as ADA. Selected king but could n’t find a way to book ADA but because my ADA needs were on the Mariot website I did n’t worry. Checked in and when I inquired if I was getting an ADA room was told no that it had to have been selected at time of reservation and there was no answer as to why my needs on the Mariot website were n’t used. I was told that if no one reserved ADA then it went into the general bed count. I asked how many ADA rooms were in this hotel 4 story would estimate 60 80 rooms. I was told there was ONE ADA room in the whole hotel. While this hotel is closer to the airport than the hotel I usually stay in it is unlikely I will ever stay here again. On the positive side the hotel has been refurbished and is quite attractive including the room I stayed in. I find that most hotels these days have very high beds which are difficult for me to get on. The height of this bed was perfect not high but not too low either. The redone bathroom was also nice. The tub had been removed and a nice large glass enclosed shower was installed. The vanity was an open table design with enough counter space. A low toilet was a challenge for me. Limited food service in the evening but had a Black Bean Brown Rice and Quinoa grain bowl that was wonderful no room service.

Very nice accommodations. The room was very modern updated clean and the staff were impeccable in their service. The shuttle driver was kind as well and got us to the airport in good time.
